item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Monday, March 17, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mitigating SourceHut's partial outage caused by aggressive crawlers (83 points | 71 comments)

7. The Atrocious State Of Binary Compatibility on Linux and How To Address It (7 points | 2 comments)
8. Installing the sassc Ruby gem on a Mac. A debugging story (8 points | no comments)
9. Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised (5 points | 3 comments)
10. What are you doing this week? (10 points | 24 comments)
11. I built myself a watch (15 points | no comments)
12. Tiny Pointers (8 points | 1 comment)

14. Verifiability is the Limit (4 points | 2 comments)
15. A Review of Helix after 1.5 Years (79 points | 29 comments)
16. Why we ditched Next.js and never looked back (20 points | 9 comments)
17. From Languages to Language Sets (13 points | 24 comments)
18. Optimal Bounds for Open Addressing Without Reordering (4 points | 4 comments)
19. Our interfaces have lost their senses (44 points | 42 comments)
20. After 47 years, OpenVMS gets a package manager (VSP) (1 points | no comments)
21. Zero-Knowledge Proofs (3 points | no comments)
22. Dioxus | Fullstack crossplatform app framework for Rust (14 points | 1 comment)
23. Zest: a programming language for malleable and legible systems (13 points | 3 comments)
24. V6 Shell (5 points | 11 comments)
25. The Defer Technical Specification: It Is Time (80 points | 31 comments)
